content:
Use Input Recommender to Generate Utterances (Beta)

You can use Input Recommender to generate lots of high-quality utterance recommendations based on phrases your customers already use in chat conversations. This feature is a Beta Service.

REQUIRED EDITIONS AND USER PERMISSIONS
Einstein Bots is available in Salesforce Classic and Lightning Experience.
Available in: Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer Editions
Customize Application or Modify Metadata or Manage Bots user permissions are needed.

Input Recommender supports 17 languages and requires at least 2,500 Chat Transcript records per language to deliver high-quality recommendations.

Enable Input Recommender by visiting the Einstein Bots Setup page and clicking Get Started. You can generate utterances for a new intent or find similar suggestions based on existing utterances.

In the Bot Builder, start at any dialog with an intent enabled and click Get Recommendations in Utterances. Provide an example intent and click Find to see utterance recommendations from your chat data. Select the recommendations you want to add to the intent model and then click Add.

You can also use Input Recommender to launch from an intent set by selecting a language that's included in the Active Languages section of Input Recommender on the Setup page.
title: Service Cloud: Einstein Bots and Input Recommender
